Name: Galba SERVIVS SVLPICIVS GALBA CAESAR AVGVSTVS
Succession: Seized power after Nero's suicide, with support of the Spanish legions
Death: January 15, 69 AD Murdered by Praetorian Guard in coup led by Otho.

Name: Otho MARCVS SALVIVS OTHO CAESAR AVGVSTVS
Death: April 16, 69 AD Committed suicide after losing Battle of Bedriacum to Vitellius

Name: Vitellius AVLVS VITELLIVS GERMANICVS AVGVSTVS
Succession: Seized power with support of German Legions (in opposition to Galba\/Otho)
Death: December 20, 69 AD Murdered by Vespasian's troops

Name: Vespasian TITVS FLAVIVS CAESAR VESPASIANVS AVGVSTVS
Succession: Seized power with the support of the eastern Legions (in opposition to Vitellius)

Name: Titus TITVS FLAVIVS CAESAR VESPASIANVS AVGVSTVS
Domitian TITVS FLAVIVS CAESAR DOMITIANVS AVGVSTVS
Death: September 18, 96 AD Assassinated by court officials
